title: Middle/Senior Devops Engineer
company_model: Dịch vụ và Tư vấn giải pháp
linh_vuc: Thuê Ngoài Phát Triển Phần Mềm
description: Mô tả công việc
- Deploy, configure, and maintain scalable and reliable infrastructure components for software systems and applications.
- Contribute to setting up and maintaining containerized environments using technologies such as Docker, ECS, K8S
- Collaborate closely with development teams to ensure efficient integration between software components and infrastructure.
- Setup and maintain monitoring and logging systems
yc: Yêu cầu công việc
- Years of experiences: At least 2 years of relevant working experience.
- Minimum education level Bachelor degree in Computer Science, Information Technology or equivalent
[Required]
- Have knowledge and understanding of Cloud Platforms (such as Amazon Web Service)
- Have knowledge and understanding of Containerization
- Have knowledge and understanding of Continuous Integration and Continuous Deployment (such as Github/Gitlab)
- Hands on experience with automation tools (such as Ansible, Terraform)
- Hands on experience with monitoring tools (such as Prometheus, Datadog, Mackerel)
- Hands on experience with web server engines (such as Nginx/Apache)
- Have knowledge and understanding of TCP/IP stack
- Hands on experience with Linux systems (such as CentOS/Ubuntu)
[Nice to Have]

- Cloud certificates
- Have knowledge and experience of Security

title: Middle/Senior Cloud Engineer (Azure, Devops)
company_model: Dịch vụ và Tư vấn giải pháp
linh_vuc: Dịch Vụ và Tư Vấn IT
description: Mô tả công việc
Are you up to becoming a Middle/Senior Cloud Engineer at TechSoft?
a Middle/Senior Cloud Engineer
We are looking for an experienced Middle/Cloud Engineer to embark on the journey with us and take part in our development team.

You’ll have at least 3 years of experience working with Azure Development, and have the technical expertise to design, implement, and maintain complex cloud-based solutions using Microsoft Azure technologies that seamlessly align with our business goals. We expect you to have good English communication skills and a knack for managing your time and priorities. Most of all, you thrive in a collaborative environment, you’re not afraid to learn new things, and you aim to have excellent work results. The perfect candidate will also have the ability to work in a fast-paced environment and confidently handle deadlines, priorities, and constraints.
Responsibilities

Azure infrastructure enterprise-level projects that design and deploy cloud environments for hosting business application services
Work closely with application, network, and security teams to ensure requirements are reflected appropriately in the Azure design
Design solutions in Microsoft Azure as per project specifications and needs
Configure and manage customer Azure cloud environment
Implement CI/CD-based application development methodology using tools like Jenkins/TFS/PowerShell
Work with clients to ensure smooth and successful implementation, delivery, and deployment of complex solutions
